de.mpa.db

Class ProjectManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mpa.db.ProjectManager

  • public class ProjectManager
extends Object
    This class handles project management by accessing project and experiment tables in the remote database.
    Author:
    T.Muth, A.Behne

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addExperimentProperties(Long experimentId, Map<String,String> expProperties)
      Adds the specified properties to the experiment associated with the specified database id.
      void addProjectProperties(Long projectId, Map<String,String> properties)
      Adds the specified properties to the project associated with the specified database id.
      ExperimentAccessor createNewExperiment(Long projectId, String title)
      Creates a new experiment with the specified title and associates it with the project associated with the specified database id.
      ProjectAccessor createNewProject(String title)
      Creates a new project with the specified title.
      void deleteExperiment(Long experimentId)
      Deletes an experiment associated with the specified database id as well as all associated properties and search spectra.
      void deleteProject(Long projectId)
      Deletes a project associated with the specified database id as well as all associated properties and experiments.
      static ProjectManager getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the project manager.
      static ProjectManager getInstance(Connection conn)
      Returns the singleton instance of the project manager and validates the provided database connection.
      List<AbstractProject> getProjects()
      Returns the list of all projects currently stored in the targeted database.
      boolean isConnected()
      Returns whether the project manager is currently connected to a remote database.
      void modifyExperimentName(Long experimentId, String title)
      Changes the title of an experiment associated with the specified database id to the specified string.
      void modifyExperimentProperties(Long experimentId, Map<String,String> newProperties, List<GeneralDialog.Operation> operations)
      Modifies the properties of a specific experiment guided by a list of operations (change, delete, add).
      void modifyProjectName(long projectId, String projectName)
      Changes the title of a project associated with the specified database id to the specified string.
      void modifyProjectProperties(Long projectId, Map<String,String> newProperties, List<GeneralDialog.Operation> operations)
      Modifies the properties of a specific project guided by a list of operations (change, delete, add).
      boolean updateConnection(Connection conn)
      Checks whether the provided connection is consistent with the manager's own and updates the latter if needed.

      • updateConnection

        public boolean updateConnection(Connection conn)
        Checks whether the provided connection is consistent with the manager's own and updates the latter if needed.
        Parameters:
        conn - the database connection to validate
        Returns:
        true if the connection has been updated, false otherwise
